release.action: Renamed configuration files (jsaga-engine.properties -> jsaga-config.properties, jsaga-config.xml -> jsaga-universe.xml)
Add support for GSI to iRoDS and SRB plug-ins.
Fixed dependencies management in GUI installer.

release.description: Initial implementation of job collection management

release.action: Added adaptors for SSH and fork.
Engine made compliant to 'snapshot-1' of SAGA Java Binding. Management of Job Collections is still under development...
Added adaptors for gLite WMS, Globus WS-GRAM and Unicore 6.
